creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
description: four-case inrō; fundame decorated in togidashi, hiramaki-e, hirame and takamaki-e with a traveler dozing on low bed, fan with Mica before face, on gold ground; reverse visions of glory 'Dream Cloud'; Saku and Kao with agate bead ojime; ivory netsuke of Ono No Tofu and frog; attached with brown, braided, silk rope through inro and ties at bottom
title: Inrō with decor of traveler dozing
